      • getLoggers

        public static java.util.List<LoggingLevelBean> getLoggers(java.lang.String filter)
        Get all loggers that are available.
        Parameters:
        filter - a string that must be contained in the class name for the LOGGER to be added to the result
        Returns:
        a list with LoggingLevelBean objects

      • encodeJSONLoggerList

        public static void encodeJSONLoggerList(java.lang.StringBuilder sb,
                        java.lang.String name,
                        java.util.List<LoggingLevelBean> list,
                        boolean last)
        Encodes a list of LoggingLevelBean(s) into a JSON object.
        Parameters:
        sb - the StringBuilder to which the JSON object is appended
        name - the parameter name of this object, like logList: {....}
        list - the list to be encoded
        last - true if this shall be the last parameter for this StringBuilder to close the JSON object

      • saveLogging

        public static boolean saveLogging(java.lang.String className,
                  org.apache.logging.log4j.Level level)
        Save a single LOGGER setting to the database
        Parameters:
        className - the class name for this logger
        level - the new logging level
        Returns:
